details.description:
Amy joined the ODI as the Business Support Administrator in September 2013. Her role involves helping with the operational side of the ODI and making sure things are running smoothly on a daily basis.

Prior to joining the ODI she was working for Teach First as part of the team delivering their Summer Institute – one of the UK’s largest residential training conferences. With a background in the festival industry she has spent most of the last five summers in fields across England and Wales and has worked at almost every major UK festival and a couple in Europe.

Outside of work she enjoys going to gigs, the cinema, exhibitions, charity shops and pub quizzes.
